§6§lHighly controllable stabilization and switching of multiple colliding soliton sequences with generic Ginzburg-Landau gain-loss§r

§8§oAvner Peleg
Toan T. Huynh§r

§72024§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o46 pages, 15 figures. The paper provides the first demonstration of robust control of multiple soliton sequences of the NLS equation in the presence of generic GLgain-loss with an arbitrary number of sequences. It
significantly extends the results of all previous works on the topic, which were limited to two-sequence transmission or to transmission with nongeneric GL gain-loss\u00a7r
